page.title: 18 Industry and Business
page.content:
{Polar Packs}is a company that makes paper and plastic containers that are disposable. They can be used in freezers. Polar Packs is is Pine Road.
{Initial Services}make soap, air fresheners and things for toilets and bathrooms.
{Draper Tools}sell tools for the garden like forks and spades and D.I.Y. tools like saws and hammers.
{Pound Lane Nursery}The Nurseryman owns 10 acres which includes a 700 year old Yew Tree. There is s deep lake where deer like to drink daily. He specializes in Dwarf Conifers and other unusual shrubs.
